name: Fixies Bakery Story Cake Mania
description:
Welcome to the very first chocolate factory with The Fixies! Are you ready to bake the most unusual cake?

The funniest cartoon characters, Fixies, have opened a cake bakery. Let’s join them and create fantastic dessert! So, download the game and ready to:
- Mix dough and bake cakes of most unusual shapes! (a car or maybe a heart?)
- Choose delicious fillers (strawberry or banana?)
- Decorate cakes with colorful glaze, candy and lollipops!
- Take photos of all your masterpieces and share them with everybody!

Characters will help players throughout the game, so even the youngest ones will be able to play without parents.
Colorful interface, funny characters and lots of candy are waiting for you!

Contact us: support@devgameou.com
Stay tuned: https://www.facebook.com/devgamestudio/
Our website: https://devgamestudio.com/
